title: Malzahar is bugged
body:
300 Base Damage, .8 scaling & a 3 second aoe Silence on a non ultimate ability.
Pretty sure that's a bug.
#Malzaharisop

replies.body:
meanwhile cho has all that and a knock-up and slow, free health, sustain and true damage on top of that.

**sorrywhoisop???**
Soraka has it too. Op ? i think not

The reason why Malzahar has strong base damage is because if you build straight AP with no health, he can deal a lot of fucking damage but he's easy to delete, you just CC him around and delete him quickly. 
But usually you build ROA which has a lot of health. 
He has low kill potential until level 6 because before that his damage 'lags' in a sense that his Q is not instant, W is DoT that depends on enemy health and his like W his E is not burst.
lol He mad because he got rekt by malz.
